text: Hadiza Bala Usman is a Nigerian politician and the current Managing Director of Nigerian Port Authority. She was previously the Chief of staff of Governor Nasir Ahmad El-Rufai of Kaduna state. == Education == Usman holds bachelors degree in business administration from Ahmadu Bello University, and masters degree in development studies from University of Lead. == Career == Usman began her career at Democratic Development and Research in Zaria, then Bereau of Public Enterprises. == References == Category:Politicians from Kaduna State Category:1976 births Category:Living people
title: Hadiza Bala Usman
